import{useEffect,useState}from"react";export function useTypingEffect(textToType){const[typedString,setTypedString]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{// condition to exit
if(textToType===typedString)return;const timeout=setTimeout(()=>{setTypedString(textToType.substring(0,typedString.length+1));},50);return()=>clearTimeout(timeout);},[textToType,typedString]);return typedString;}
